post.body: Or as we say now, nothing but carbs.
Ooooooo. He's always so evil.
Other one was tastier.
So it was providential you broke your frelling boot.
You're always looking, whether anyone is looking or not.
Innit just. T_T
Re: Avatar movie and stupidity - Here you go. *sigh* http://tinyurl.com/5wzlq9
Never tried either. I went from TwitterFox straight to TweetDeck and never looked back.
Nah. It's just morning ick in my case. I'd have other symptoms if I were getting sick. But thanks for the concern. *smooch*
Download TweetDeck. it makes things much simpler.
Thank you. I probably just need a cup of tea or something.
You can DO it! *pompons*
At least you could ask me to help you with that one. I probably have seen the cartoons.
Because pancakes know no hour?
Awww. It'll rerun before too long, though. You know CN.
Glad you enjoyed it. Did you see the Plastic Man episode? Comedy Gold.
He was ALREADY spoiled, hence the tantrum. So they didn't want to reward that by giving him the toy?
They were trying to teach him a lesson. With their money they probably could've found him one anyway.
I don't think they couldn't afford it, so much as they hoped he'd like the heirloom they actually /gave/ him.
There are a BUNCH of references in this episode too, yeah.
That episode was both sweet and painful.
Pft. In this economy there are LOTS of people whose credit ratings are going down the ol' tubes.
What commercial is THAT?! Ew. Tacky.
You pay half the rent. It's not really "barging". Can you text your roommate a warning? not fair you're held hostage either.
So, what, they're nookieing all over the kitchen & living room? Unequitable.
For discussions on subjects, and to look up same on search.twitter.com
Danku for clarifying. Text doesn't always convey intended inflection, so I checked.
How poetic.
I was figging on NJ actually. Close enough for horseshoes.
"Riiiiiight" ....? Not sure what tone that was.
You get stressed out a lot when it comes to commissioned art for people getting married...
With what I'm making now, $625 is probably the max. But I'd also have to get transferred back up there. That's my 09 project.
I couldn't do it without Effexor, hon :/
Can't do the roommate thing, no. You do know how badly my last few roomie sitches have ended.
Yes. I just randomly quote the cartoon I'm watching when the line sounds really wrong out of context.
Brahms Lullaby, Speaker! Go and get some sleep!
When I want to kill a germ dead with alcohol, I make Heaven's Breath.
I'm /from/ NYC. I just live in GA. I'll go back to NY if I can ever afford it.
They taste like two separate flavors of DO NOT WANT.
Squeeeee! <3
Glad to hear your balls are okay. ^_^ ROFL.
*glomp* glad my Tall Lady is safe. *shakes fist at burro sombrero*
You can boog me anytime.
Why did you have to say that?! Now I crave it.
clearly we need to teach you personal Wingardium Leviosa.
Tritto'd. I love Trader Joe's!
I know. It's just enduring the scalp pulling until then.
Dextromethorphan, Speaker! Get well soon! *smooch*
Washed my hair and felt like it. Plus, going in 2 weeks to see the family.
In 41 mins, I've done 3 braids of 6 locks each between RP poses. Yay me.
No worries.
I wasn't asking. I was *acknowledging* :)
OMG. *bows down before your hairbraiding might*
See you there! Underthings...tumbling...
No thanks, you're already spoken for. ^_^
T his is why you put candles in the bathroom, or keep a space heater until you're no longer damp.
It works for me, but that's because I know the movie practically by heart.
Not everybody gives junk for Valentine's day. Some of us give each other useful pressies.
Neither. Just background noise while I ate.
I just joined the cartoonists Twitter Group http://tgr.me/g/cartoonists and you can too. Please Retweet.
Another patch of blue sky shrinking away.
Showed my lovecard from my @shaycaron to my coworker and she went "awwwww! that's so nice!" When I said he sent it just because, she beamed.
Next time somebody tells you there's a War on Christmas or only Christians are moral, show them this: http://kishcom.com/the_golden_rule.jpg
Apparently it is snowing in New Orleans, and this is wigging those folks the hell out.
Wow. I'm really slow. I went boggly over Jesse McCartney, but didn't realize they cast all caucasian kids for the asianesque Avatar film.
Woke up with itchy throat. Not amused.
The Miser Bros Song is the best thing about this new special so far.
Mmmmm. Think it's time for me to be calling it a night, tweeps.
Oooooo. Want for Christmas! http://tinyurl.com/6j9ebk #cartoonists
Jaime-Beetle reminds me a lot of Spidey. Y'think that's intentional?
#stepcount 3133
#stepcount 2504
Avatar Race Fail BINGO: http://community.livejournal.com/deadbrowalking/315016.html *sigh*
Ok, time to hustle. I can't very well go to work nekkid.
Space Ghost: (strained voice) He's ...going...IN!!
House making little frog noises to entertain a baby.
Ow. Hair looks awesome. Skull aches because braids are so tight.
And now -- bath and hair washing! (Not using that shampoo but cue the orgasm yells anyway)
Mmmmmmm. Kasugai.
*yawn* Breakfast and Zombies. Ahhh.
